description:
Nami gives love advice to a zombie, Luffy finds himself face-to-face with Gecko Moria, and Robin gets caught in spooky spider web. Things look bleak for the Straw Hats until their skeleton friend lends a hand!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Appearing from the Sky! That Man Is the Humming Swordsman!
Il surgit du ciel ! Escrimeur, gentleman et fredonneur à ses heures
Sora kara Sanjou! Kenkyou Hanauta wa Ano Otoko!
Упавший с неба! Поющий мечник – это он!
ظهور من السماء! ذلك الرجل هو السّيّاف المهمهم!
空から参上! 剣狭ハナウタはあの男!
